title: (9/21/17) (2:12PM EST) Stuck In A Game
body: So My friend and I finished playing an ARAM game and we couldnt honor anyone, all we had was a button that said "Skip Waiting For Stats" so we clicked it. We tried to reinvite eachother to a new game but couldn't. We logged out and back into league only to be presented with the black loading screen and a message that said "Unable To Connect To Server" we hit cancel and now we are stuck at the Reconnect Button.

replies.body: We're investigating ghost game issues currently causing some players to get stuck at reconnecting.  This should resolve on its own after time, but our network guys are posting updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hang tight!
